availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac A. Clinkenbeard (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Clinkenbeard and Susannah Clinkenbeard. Married to Mary "Polly" Ann Crouch Clinkenbeard in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on December 21, 1851. Father of John Clinkenbeard, Amanda Clinkenbeard, and William Clinkenbeard. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 471B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 159.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, 1832-1859, Film #000252408, p. 622 of 715 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Nicholas County Administrators Bonds, 1854-1969, p. 175, p. 1240 of 1714 of microfilm (accessed through Ancestry.com).
